alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 16 at 9:02PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Arizona, including the following county, Mohave. * WHEN...Until midnight MST. * IMPACTS...Rises in small streams and normally dry washes. Water over roadways. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 857 PM MST, Automated gauge on the Detrital Wash at Highway 93 reported about a 3 feet increase in water depth. This will continue to flow northward and may overtop White Hills Road where it crosses Detrital Wash. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Along the Detrial Wash between Dolan Springs and White Hills Road. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
